alert.note: Alert for Cass; Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 11:32AM CDT until August 02 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Itasca County in north central Minnesota... Northeastern Cass County in north central Minnesota... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 1131 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Boy River, or 22 miles east of Walker, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Deer River, Zemple and Days High Landing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
